# JSON Quiz

Extensible JSON quiz format based on [JSON Schema](http://json-schema.org).

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/json-quiz/json-quiz.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/json-quiz/json-quiz)

## Setup

```
  npm install
```

## Test

```
  npm test
```
  
## Documentation
  
```
  npm run doc
```
